Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

Volume_PDS3.archive_status_note: The database contains a value of NULL. For the purposes of this exercise, the value was replaced with IN_QUEUE
Volume_PDS3.volume_name: CHRONOLOGICAL DATA FOR COMET HALLEY ARCHIVED BY THE IHW
Volume_PDS3.description:
A compilation of data for Comet Halley that spans the dates Dec 09, 1985 through Feb 09, 1986. For this disc the files are indicated in the table below:
Contents
per disk
disk start directory MB files dirs start time stop directory stop time
23 \Y1987\M04\D04 1 1987-04-04T00:44:11.616Z \Y1989\M04\D12 440 692 87 1989-04-12T06:53:45.312Z
The directory files are not included in the counts. This specific disk contains the original data, documentation, ephemeris, and other supplementary information as listed below:
1. VOLDESC.SFD file which specifies the identification for the dataset contents.
2. Calibration data for comets in two forms: chronologically ordered with the data, and collected into a separate directory. Note the LSPN calibration data has been subsampled.
3. Infrared filter data in two forms: digitized tracing as well as a published table.
4. Data collected for comet Halley related meteor showers.
5. Astrometric data from two earlier appearances of the comet (1835- 36 and 1909-11).
6. Detached labels for each data file in the PDS and FITS protocols.
7. An ephemeris of comet positions for Comet Halley.
8. Software that can be used to interpolate the comet position or other utilities to manipulate FITS files.
